channel.title: Cannot run server. Null pointer exception
channel.description:
Hi, I just saw the EasyRSC link on the other RSC category. I finally got all of my variables set up correctly and now I can't run the server. I wonder if anyone will help try and solve this, maybe? Here is the error I get when I click Run-Server.bat:
[code]runserver: [java] java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError [java] Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.GUI.cout(GUI.java:1491) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.util.Logger.error(Logger.java:30) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.model.World.getWorld(World.java:87) [java] at org.rscdaemon.server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:29) [java] Exception in thread "main" [java] Java Result: 1[/code]

item.title: Cannot run server. Null pointer exception
